so what I'm going to do is make a few

it'll squash down a bit and these cuts
help what helps marinate penetrate the
meat so when whatever you put on it
whether its own garlic or lemon or oil
or pepper or spices and herbs they'll
penetrate the meat much better if the
slashes in it and of course when it goes
on the grill the heat will penetrate it
faster and it'll cook much more evenly
so now the lamb is all basically the
same thickness or it's got slashes in
the thicker bits to help the heat
penetrate and it's all going to cook at
the same time this is what you've got
from the inside the outside or one nice
piece so it's easy to cook on the

that's how to bone and butterfly a leg
